Articles.Content:
Hello there,

I have previously dreamed of making an RP series which would focus on combat elements and story within the stock KSP game, however after only 2 videos I scrapped the idea as I wasn't having fun doing it. However the recent update has presented an interesting new angle on this kind of content.

I am currently creating a series of which I will role-play as the head of a brand new space company, starting from scratch in career mode eventually building up to large scale capital ships, carriers, mining vessels and combat. The in-game elements like reputation and money restrictions will add an interesting twist to the regular sandbox series, which I thought was pretty neat as I would have to carefully consider each launch I make and every move I make or face bankruptcy, humiliation and mistrust among the Kerbal society.

Though it's starting slow as I am effectively re-learning KSP with the new aerodynamics I think it could potentially turn into something neat (see below the first few videos, they're starting slow but will progressively advance)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/IJRZotQHqLY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/vfdJMc54_-k?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Please let me know what you think and any recommendations that would go to making this better.
